FuncDef: This command enables BGP routes to be matched based on the BGP next-hop address. The match condition is evaluated against the IPv4 or IPv6 address in the NEXT_HOP or MP_REACH_NLRI attribute.

ParaDef.Info: An IPv4 or IPv6 address. Values-a.b.c.d or x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x or x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d.
Specifies the name of a prefix-list (up to 32 characters).
Specifies that the BGP next hop should be matched against a prefix-list instead of an individual IP address.
